:::{#thm-d_pi-d_eta}

$$\derivf{\pi}{\logodds} = \pi (1-\pi)$$
:::

---

::: proof

By the chain rule (@thm-chain-rule), @thm-d_pi-d_eta, and @lem-d_omega-d_eta:

$$
\ba
\derivf{\pi}{\logodds} 
&= \green{\derivf{\odds}{\logodds}}\blue{\derivf{\pi}{\odds}}
\\
&= \green{\frac{\pi}{1-\pi}} \blue{(1-\pi)^2}
\\
&= \pi (1-\pi)
\ea
$$

:::
